Nighlight/Trinity:

Trinity arrived where Nightlight was, who was still unconcious.

"Nightlight??" said worried the girl-bot "Are you ok?? wake 
up..."said Trinity while she touched Nightlight's shoulder with her 
tiny paw"Wake up..." Trinity was scared now,  she started cried 
aloud, she heard Burning Hammer's voice around and ran where he was 
calling him "bURNING HAMMMER!!!!!"
